description: This file defines the main home page component for a web application, structured with React. It includes UI elements such as links to JIRA projects, Confluence pages, and connection management, as well as a chat playground component that handles referencing of JIRA or Confluence items. The code primarily sets up the frontend layout and interactivity for the homepage.
published: default export of the Home component

methods.name: Home
methods.description: The main React functional component for the homepage, rendering navigation links, a chat input interface, and recent reference items.
